post.body: we can be short together, i'm 5'3" #gno
i just tried blue cheese...wow, wasn't expecting to like it! #gno
seriously? i would never thought of that instead of a stool. #gno
although jumping rope is very good for the body! works everything at once! #gno
i'm not into that, i'm more of a hula girl! anything to get to Hawii #gno
i'm not into video games at all but somehow the Wii Fit is unusually FUN! who would have known? #gno
i can't jump rope, after having kids, it's nearly impossible for me to jump w/o needing to run for the bathroom. #gno
yes, we were talking about the Wii Fit and the hula hoops...!:)#gno
yea, that would be interesting!
oh, didn't think of that! #gno
i've never done that but I've heard it's a workout! #gno
i can't imagine what you would need for that...but it would be worth it! #gno
i think we should contact Nintendo about a Wii Pole! #gno
i hear ya, one for the kids, the hubby and one for me! that will work! #gno
that's so funny! i love the hula hoops...i'm very competive with myself too #gno
no kidding, my kids know more about technology than I do! i just act like I know more...#gno
my kids are all older, we have to share.. for my bday in Jan. i asked for another Wii. haha! #gno
okay, i'm leaving to play Wii Fit! tweet ya soon! #gno
my kids are asking if i'm going to do Wii Fit, i'm having so much fun here! #gno
if they only made a Wii Pole, now that would work it! #gno
